summary: After his bike and money gets stolen from him, Lucio struggles to find his place in the surrounding reality of Argentina in the 1990s A slowly told story of adolescence of an outcast and a ... See full summary »
cast: Ezequiel Cavia|Damián Dreizik|Mirta Busnelli|Horacio Peña|Lucas Marty|Cecilia Biagini|José Glusman|Pichón Baldinú|Verónica Llinás
title: Rapado
